name: 4-7-8 Breathing
description:
Feeling stressed?


4-7-8 Breathing is a form of guided breathing to help remove stress and feel calm.


How it works

✓ Breathe in through the nose for 4 seconds

✓ Hold the breath for a count of 7 seconds

✓ Exhale with mouth pursing lips for 8 seconds

✓ Repeat the cycle 4 times


Learn more

You can read more about 4-7-8 breathing at Healthline.
